tagged_story_for_tts:
Vivid displays.<[silence]> Energy efficiency.<[silence]>
The term 'OLED' stands for 'Organic Light Emitting Diode'.<[silence]>
In 2007, the first OLED TV was released, revolutionizing display technology.<[silence]>
OLEDs emit light through organic compounds when an electric current passes through.<[silence]>
Example: Smartphones use OLED screens for deeper blacks and vibrant colors.<[silence]>
Related subjects: display technology, energy consumption, organic electronics.<[silence]>
clean_story: Vivid displays. Energy efficiency. The term 'OLED' stands for 'Organic Light Emitting Diode'. In 2007, the first OLED TV was released, revolutionizing display technology. OLEDs emit light through organic compounds when an electric current passes through. Example: Smartphones use OLED screens for deeper blacks and vibrant colors. Related subjects: display technology, energy consumption, organic electronics.
